#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;


  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  RaftServer& server = GetRaftServer();
  string s_oid = to_string(oid);
  auto cmd = MakeMarshallable(s_oid, "put", k, v);
  uint64_t index = 0, term = 0;
  if (waiting.find(s_oid) != waiting.end()) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  KVOperationReply event = MakeKVOperationReply();
  waiting[s_oid] = event;
  bool result = server.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if (!result) {
    waiting.erase(s_oid);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Coroutine::Sleep(300000);
  int operationResult = waiting[s_oid].status;


  waiting.erase(s_oid);
  return operationResult;
}


int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  RaftServer& server = GetRaftServer();
  string s_oid = to_string(oid);
  auto cmd = MakeMarshallable(s_oid, "append", k, v);
  uint64_t index = 0, term = 0;
  if (waiting.find(s_oid) != waiting.end()) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  KVOperationReply event = MakeKVOperationReply();
  waiting[s_oid] = event;
  bool result = server.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if (!result) {
    waiting.erase(s_oid);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Coroutine::Sleep(300000);
  int operationResult = waiting[s_oid].status;
  waiting.erase(s_oid);


  return operationResult;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  RaftServer& server = GetRaftServer();
  string s_oid = to_string(oid);
  auto cmd = MakeMarshallable(s_oid, "get", k, *v);
  uint64_t index = 0, term = 0;
  if (waiting.find(s_oid) != waiting.end()) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  KVOperationReply event = MakeKVOperationReply();
  waiting[s_oid] = event;
  bool result = server.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if (!result) {
    waiting.erase(s_oid);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Coroutine::Sleep(300000);
  int operationResult = waiting[s_oid].status;
  *v = waiting[s_oid].value;
  waiting.erase(s_oid);
  return operationResult;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  RaftServer& server = GetRaftServer();
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  string s_oid = v->data_ .at(0);
  string operation = v->data_.at(1);
  string key = v->data_.at(2);
  string value = v->data_.at(3);
  if (operation == "put") {
    store[key] = value;
  } else if (operation == "append") {
    store[key] += value;
  }
  if (waiting.find(s_oid) == waiting.end()) {
    return;
  }
  KVOperationReply& reply = waiting[s_oid];
  reply.status = KV_SUCCESS;
  if (operation == "get") {
    reply.value = store[key];
  }
}

shared_ptr<Marshallable> ShardKvServer::MakeMarshallable(string& s_oid, string operation, const string& k, const string& v) {
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(s_oid);
  s->data_.push_back(operation);
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  return s;
}

KVOperationReply ShardKvServer::MakeKVOperationReply(int status, string value) {
  KVOperationReply event;
  event.status = status;
  event.value = value;
  return event;
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
